artist: Artist: School of Joseph Mallord William Turner R.A.
description: Sketch book of 1817 containing 16 landscapes in Crayon and watercolor of Hants (Hampshire) and Sussex, and attributed to Turner.  Some bear titles purported to be in Turner's handwriting.  16 drawings on 15 leaves and the inside of the back cover.
markings:
on first sketch: [Aldermoor Lodge Hants]; on second sketch: [Masseu]; on tenth sketch: [At Stamere 1818]; on back cover: [At Brighton]
Watermark: LL: <A>
medium: Black chalk, watercolor and colored chalks on heavy tan laid paper with a pinkish cast
title: Sketchbook of Landscape Subjects
